original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2196)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2196)@</color>以指定點為中心，召喚一個大型從天而降的龍捲風，將敵人捲起並以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2196)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2196)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2196)@</color> takes the specified point as the center, summons a large tornado that falls from the sky, rolls up the enemy and uses <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2196)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Intellect</color> inflicts spell damage on the enemy.
